3411e71ceec7b03612394da030bf96bfa364790f.query:
SELECT widget_configuration FROM stores
        WHERE store_hash = $1;

409a8f47b73ac8957b005d289547f330ce462ac5.query:
INSERT INTO charity_visited_events (store_hash, charity, created_at)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3);

56233a8901131d539dcb562b66d0e2d3bfe6226d.query:
SELECT published FROM stores
        WHERE store_hash = $1;

5ca043250709b09e58c15542b322ceea22526ff8.query:
INSERT INTO widget_events (store_hash, event_type, created_at)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3);

ea92a0d130fec78ee1f88cc529ee67d1d1247d17.query: SELECT access_token, store_hash FROM stores WHERE store_hash = $1

f61338aa051a3a81e92b5c91fbc48d3c5a45fe3d.query:
UPDATE stores
        SET widget_configuration = $1
        WHERE store_hash = $2
        RETURNING id
